ygData.subject: Women and Computers Study
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi, My name is Kamala Norris, and I am a Social Psychology Ph.D. student at Claremont Graduate University in Claremont, California.  I am conducting a survey
ygData.messageBody:
Hi,

My name is Kamala Norris, and I am a Social Psychology Ph.D. student
at Claremont Graduate University in Claremont, California. I am
conducting a survey investigating women's computer use for my
thesis. I am currently recruiting women over age 18 for this study
and will be randomly awarding a $100 prize to one of the
respondents. I would *greatly* appreciate your participation.

If you are interested, the URL for the survey is:

http://www.surveymonkey.com/s.asp?u=8812573

Thank you!

Kamala Norris
Claremont Graduate University
kamala.norris@...
